portfolio_value.description: Total value of cash + holding positions (This field is deprecated. It is equivalent to the equity field.)

pattern_day_trader.description: Whether or not the account has been flagged as a pattern day trader

trade_suspended_by_user.description: User setting. If true, the account is not allowed to place orders.

trading_blocked.description: If true, the account is not allowed to place orders.

transfers_blocked.description: If true, the account is not allowed to request money transfers.

account_blocked.description: If true, the account activity by user is prohibited.

created_at.description: Timestamp this account was created at

shorting_enabled.description: Flag to denote whether or not the account is permitted to short

long_market_value.description: Real-time MtM value of all long positions held in the account

short_market_value.description: Real-time MtM value of all short positions held in the account

last_equity.description: Equity as of previous trading day at 16:00:00 ET

multiplier.description: Buying power multiplier that represents account margin classification; valid values 1 (standard limited margin account with 1x buying power), 2 (reg T margin account with 2x intraday and overnight buying power; this is the default for all non-PDT accounts with $2,000 or more equity), 4 (PDT account with 4x intraday buying power and 2x reg T overnight buying power)

buying_power.description: Current available $ buying power; If multiplier = 4, this is your daytrade buying power which is calculated as (last_equity - (last) maintenance_margin) * 4; If multiplier = 2, buying_power = max(equity â€“ initial_margin,0) * 2; If multiplier = 1, buying_power = cash

initial_margin.description: Reg T initial margin requirement (continuously updated value)

sma.description: Value of special memorandum account (will be used at a later date to provide additional buying_power)

daytrade_count.description: The current number of daytrades that have been made in the last 5 trading days (inclusive of today)

last_maintenance_margin.description: Your maintenance margin requirement on the previous trading day

daytrading_buying_power.description: Your buying power for day trades (continuously updated value)

regt_buying_power.description: Your buying power under Regulation T (your excess equity - equity minus margin value - times your margin multiplier)
